name: Blow Up (cuwuu, Leon Jannik Bartels, Cross9S, Limak, Alstrak)
name_original: Blow Up (cuwuu, Leon Jannik Bartels, Cross9S, Limak, Alstrak)
description:
The little fish puffey is endlessly exploring the ocean while dodging other sea animals and obstacles.

Space to swim up.

Small little game made in the span of 7 hours for a micro game jam.
